transcript: who to hire in what order Layla has a great activity around this which is doing a Time study you have all the hours of the day put into 15-minute increments and this may sound tedious it's also really effective and will make you more money than it costs you time at the end of the week of these things what is the single largest block of time that I can give away for the lowest amount of money oftentimes in early days it's usually going to be delivery or administrative tasks and so it depends on how you run as an entrepreneur
